summary: A critique of the role of the male in modern Italian society and has demonstrated the possibility of a form of 'female bonding' between women who live, by choice, in a world without men
cast: Liv Ullmann|Catherine Deneuve|Giuliana de Sio|Philippe Noiret|Giuliano Gemma|Bernard Blier|Stefania Sandrelli|Lucrezia Lante della Rovere|Paolo Hendel|Athina Cenci|Francesca Cal√≤|Simona Cera|Mario Cecchi|Riccardo Diana|Enio Drovandi|Nuccia Fumo|Carlo Monni|Paul Muller|Adalberto Maria Merli
title: Esperemos que sea mujer
